article.title: SAIC's GPS Contract Extended
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Air Force Space & Missile Systems Center

article.text: Science Applications International Corporation, McLean, Virginia, is being awarded a $9,989,452 firm-fixed-price and cost-plus-award-fee contract that will extend the Global Positioning System (GPS) systems engineering and international contract by 60 days. Air Force Space & Missile Systems Center is the contracting activity.
